item.title: Overnight Clashes Strain Diplomacy Efforts for India and Pakistan

item.title: ‘Justice for Cwecwe’: Report of a Child’s Rape Enrages South Africans
item.description: A mother’s call for justice has challenged a culture of shame and inspired a nationwide movement to tackle the crisis of sexual violence.
